body.p: If you were debating between colleges B and F only, which one would you choose based on this data? Explain your reasoning.

explanation.p: While Colleges B and F have about the same median graduation rate (B: 70.15%, F: 72%), there is a big difference in the variation. College F has a very large variation, and therefore a much less consistent gradation rate over the years (it can get as low as 57.7%). College B, on the other hand, has a much more consistent graduation rate (small variability), and in that sense, college B is less "risky." Since I am not a "risk taker," and since both colleges have approximately the same median graduation rate, my choice between the two would be college B.
